ygData.subject: FW: First Magic Weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Tentacle whip can usually be had for about 15 plat. It is the best starter weapon. Use it to spank wisps in West Commons, to earn cash fer a better weapon. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Tentacle whip can usually be had for about 15 plat. It is the best starter
weapon. Use it to spank wisps in West Commons, to earn cash fer a better
weapon.

-----Original Message-----
From: blademaster@... [mailto:blademaster@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 11:59 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] First Magic Weapon?


From: blademaster@...

Hey, I was glad to finally get another message from the list!! Sorry, I
haven't been on lately, but bought a new house and moving everything over,
haven't had the computer hooked up for about a week and a half, so ..... I
have a question for all the SKs out there, I have just reached 14th lvl
(woo-hoo!!), and things seem to be going okay. My one major deficiency
right now seems to be that I do not have a magic weapon. I keep both 1HS
and 2HS maxxed out, and have virtually no skill in the others (all below
10). Hunting in Lavastorm is very difficult without a magic weapon, and I
am starting to run into more and more INVULNERABLE!s elsewhere as well.
(Ghouls, etc.....) What is a good 1H or 2H slashing weapon that is that is
both magic and inexpensive? How much play should I plan on spending? I can
make some cash, but never seem to have the 200-300 plat for the auctioned
weapons I would *like* to have..... <grin>. Any recommendations out there?
Any higher level SKs with an old magic 1HS or 2HS that they would be willing
to part with for a reasonable sum on the Povar server? Any help my fellow
SKs could lend would be very much appreciated!! Tvar 14th DE SK, Povar
Council of the Griffin Lords
